title: His Curvy Dessert
description: An Alpha Male Insta-Love Younger Woman RomanceJade Every day was the same until Will Bennett walked into my life. Impossibly handsome, successful, and kind, he’s totally my type. But there’s no way I’m his. I have to figure out why he’s here. When the truth comes out, I’m not sure that I can handle it. But he’s not going to let me go without a fight.  Will No woman ever caught my eye like Jade. She’s curvy. Feisty. Funny. I want her and I always get what I want. I just have to take care of some business first. She just has to trust me. There’s no way I’m letting her go.  This is a sexy story that is sure to make you sizzle! Designed to be a standalone story so you can read the series in any order, this book is full of instalove and smoldering scenes without any cheating. Enjoy this steamy love story with a great HEA. A gorgeous plus-size lady and her sexy Alpha are destined to an incredible life together…
author: Bailey Rock
